Convert inputs to PDF content for multimodal API requests

Source: R/utils.R
as_pdf_content.Rd

Marks PDF file paths or URLs as PDF content to be passed to LLM APIs. Different providers handle PDFs differently:

  • OpenAI Assistants API: PDFs are uploaded with purpose="assistants" and attached to messages

  • Google Gemini: PDFs use the File API with vision models

  • Other providers: May convert to base64 or other formats

Usage

as_pdf_content(
  ...,
  .pdf_converter = default_pdf_converter,
  .provider_options = list()
)

Arguments

...

One or more PDF inputs. Can be:

  • Local PDF file paths

  • PDF URLs (downloaded and uploaded for providers that don't support remote URLs)

.pdf_converter

Function. Custom converter function with signature function(input). Default is default_pdf_converter.

.provider_options

List. Provider-specific options to attach as attributes. Default is an empty list. For OpenAI Assistants, can include 'tools' to specify which tools to use with the attachment (default: file_search).

Value

Character vector with PDF references. Has attribute argent_input = TRUE and each element has argent_input_type = "pdf".
